name: Wendy Corzo
description: '''Wendy Paola Corzo Carmona'''{{family name footnote|Corzo|Carmona|lang=Spanish}} (born 1996 or 1997) is a Colombian [[vallenato]] accordionist. She has twice won the accordionist competition of the [[Encuentro Vallenato Femenino]], and was vallenato queen of the [[Vallenato Legend Festival]] in 2023.
